mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT c.`company_name`,l.`plaintiffs`,l.`court`,l.`casereason`,l.`url`,l.`caseno`,l.`title`,l.`abstracts`,l.`submittime`, l.`lawsuitUrl`,l.`casetype`,l.`doctype`,l.`agent`,l.`thirdParties`,l.`defendants` FROM `lawsuit` l,`company` c,`product` p, z_product_type z WHERE l.company_id=c.id AND c.`id`=p.`company_id` AND p.product_type_id=z.id AND z.id=1;

SELECT l.*,c.`company_name` FROM lawsuit l,company c
and l.`company_id`=c.`id`
AND c.`company_name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{company_name},'%')
AND l.casetype LIKE CONCAT('%',#{casetype},'%')
AND l.doctype LIKE CONCAT('%',#{doctype},'%')
AND defendants LIKE CONCAT('%',#{defendants},'%')
AND l.`submittime`=#{submittime}
